channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [FELIX-2154] IllegalArgumentException: Argument not valid exception seen when closing and reopening project editor

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Problem caused by calling dispose on shared image - patch supplied to fix this issue
